Information.Title: Enke's Jazz Warehouse
Information.Subtitle: Staff Information Page
Information.Purpose: This page contains information on the staff of Enke's Jazz Warehouse. Staff members are divided into four groups: Accounting, Sales, Manufacturing, and Advertising. Each employee's name, department, position, phone number, years employed, and job status (full or part-time) is reported.
Information.Author: Evan Enke
